summary:
Turns any companion into a ride-able talking horse for 60 seconds
All dialogue still able to be used
descriptionHtml:
[center]Video says it all :)

[youtube]7v1m44DYO5E[/youtube]


Also new trailer for Discwrolds Alpha build
[youtube]FEBNe8XINd0[/youtube]


Longer Road So Far Trailer
[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]

[/center]
Mod adds a spell tome in the companions guild living area
Spell 'should' only turn followers into horses
Spell will only work on one companion at a time even with UFO etc
Follower is knocked down after transformation to re-initialize AI packages
Player will be forced to dismount 5 seconds before the follower transforms back
:)

Should work with everything from vilja to sofia to Dhalia and Allune

Russian translation Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56792/?
author: darren83
